transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello yeah haji namaskar sir Saurav ji baat kar rahe hain Samrat traders se.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Saurav ji namaskar main account manager aapka baat kar raha Rahul head office se.
Hmm hmm.
Executive: Saurav ji video meet ka aapne ek request dala tha. To usi ke liye maine aapko call kiya.
Hmm hmm. Batao sir kaise kya help kar sakta hun sir connect karna hai video meet pe kya concern chal raha hai batao sir.
Customer: Ji concern kuch nahi hai aapse interaction kare aap naye assign hue hain hamare ko.
Executive: Achcha sir okay okay connect abhi to. Nahi mujhe laga kuch concern. Mujhe laga koi concern koi pareshani to aapne dala hua hai kuch problem maine socha aapse baat kar lu ek baar.
Customer: Yaar main chahta to unse karwa leta direct aap bolte to Pankaj ji se bol deta.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa nahi aap mujhe bolo direct sir main aapko personal number bhi de dunga apna.
Executive: Are sir mere paas Dinesh sir ki personal number hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Aapne mere ko kya aap team floor pe naye ho kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi maine socha number aapko de deta hun sir kahin bhi dikkat aaye to aap matlab ki direct mujhse baat kar lijiye.
Customer: Are main to aapse sirf puch raha hun floor pe naye ho kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir mujhe IndiaMART mein do saal se upar ho gaye hain sir.
Customer: Do teen saal ho gaye aur mujhe nahi jante aisa kaise ho gaya yaar mere ko to har aadmi achchi tarah jante hain.
Executive: Nahi is department actually main bata du is department mein mera movement hua ya do month hue hain main pehle dusra department dekha tha sir actually. Kiski team mein ho aap Pankaj ji?
Executive: Nahi nahi Sarfaraz sir hai team unhi team mein hai jiya sir ke andar. Achcha ha pehle Aditya tha Aditya ne to chhod diya. Haan ha. Haan ha abhi to senior Sarfaraz sir hai unke senior Ankita mam hai aur hai jo. Haan ye to account wapis Sarfaraz ke paas hi jayega Sarfaraz ji ke paas hi wo aapke man ka rog nahi hai ye matlab.
Customer: Achcha. Haan koi baat nahi.
Executive: Karo video meet karo mujhe kuch cheeze check check karni hai.
Customer: Okay ji okay sir main aapko link de raha hun. Haan de dijiye.
[inaudible]
[inaudible] ye aur ye dono hai na ye ID aur brightness dono ke liye hai.
[inaudible] karoge to fasoge dekho.
[inaudible] mere sath shari karoge.
[inaudible] jaoge.
Customer: Main na Delhi
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wanted to interact with the executive.



Resolution:

- Executive interacted with the customer.

- Executive offered his personal number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a video meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, interaction, department
